lexUnit.name: injure.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: do or undergo physical harm to; wound.

sentence.text: Kenya lodged a strong protest after four Kenyan policemen were killed and four injured by Somali troops at the Hare-Hare border settlement on Sept. 20 , 1989 .
